author: Jeff Poor, Jeff Poor
title: Al Gore: Trump Has Learned 'You Can't Gaslight a Virus'
description: During an appearance on CNN on Monday, former Vice President Al Gore offered his thoughts on President Donald Trump's handling of the coronavirus pandemic after being prodded to by network host Don Lemon. | Clips
content:
During an appearance on CNN on Monday, former Vice President Al Gore offered his thoughts on President Donald Trump’s handling of the coronavirus pandemic after being prodded to by network host Don Lemon.
